revision.text:
This is the default [[sound sequence]] for closing a normal door with a DORM* texture in ''[[Strife]]''. It is redirected from [[DoorLargeMetal]]. It is also used for opening [[animated door]]s with the SIGLDR01 texture.
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :DoorCloseLargeMetal play doors/large_metal_close nostopcutoff end [[Category:Sound sequences]]
